name: Stairway to Heaven (cleverusername82)
description:
Stairway to Heaven is a short game set in Heaven, where the last line of defense is also the first, the stairway leading up to the gates. You play as a group of rallied stairs, set on throwing off the invaders' footing as they climb up your defense. 

This game was made in Unity over the course of two days for "Mini Jam 70: Heaven" with the theme of Heaven and restriction of having the player be an inanimate object. This is my first game and jam, thank you for playing!
